1.0.0.name: connect20/Cybage_Swatches
1.0.0.description: Administrator can use the Color Swatch plug-in for configurable products to define their color, related size, and price at Magento store. For example, you can sell t-shirts in two colors and three sizes. The plug-in is used to define any type of attribute such as size, price, manufacturer, and color.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
